title: North Korean hackers have abandoned Tornado Cash for Bitcoin Mixers: TRM Labs
description:
North Korean hackers have increasingly favored Bitcoin (BTC) mixers over Tornado Cash (TORN) since U.S. authorities imposed sanctions on the cryptocurrency mixer, according to blockchain analytical firm TRM Labs. Last year, the U.S. Treasury enacted sanctions against Tornado Cash over allegations that it helped criminals launder their illegally acquired digital assets. This move effectively banned mainstream […]

The post North Korean hackers have abandoned Tornado Cash for Bitcoin Mixers: TRM Labs appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Circle Partners With Coins.ph To Promote Financial Inclusion
description: The partnership aims to drive awareness of USDC-denominated remittances as a secure, low-cost, and near-instant solution for international money transfers for Coins.ph's 18 million Filipino users.

title: Coins.ph and Circle join forces to revolutionize remittance in the Philippines
description: To promote USDC-denominated remittances in the Philippines, local fintech entity Coins.ph has forged a strategic alliance with Circle, the creator of the USDC stablecoin. The agenda behind this partnership is to cultivate a broader adoption of cryptocurrency remittances via the stablecoin among the 18 million Filipinos utilizing Coins.ph. title: Adobe Unveils “CR Pin”: A New Era of Transparency in AI-Generated Imagery
description: As generative AI technologies soar to unprecedented heights, the lines between genuine human creations and AI-generated images and videos have become increasingly blurred. Recognizing the urgency for transparency, tech giants like Adobe and Microsoft have teamed up with other industry leaders to launch the “CR Pin”, a revolutionary new identifier for AI-generated content. title: Digital Shovel to launch new line of modular crypto mining centers
description: Digital Shovel has launched the latest evolution of its MiniPOD line of modular cryptocurrency mining data centers, the S300 MiniPOD.

title: Ripple Prepares for Settlement Talks and Potential Victory Over Gary Gensler and the SEC in Major Update
description: Amid these regulatory challenges, Ripple’s Chief Financial Officer, Kristina Campbell, has departed from the company, XRP under pressure. title: Bitcoin’s Price Plunge: $27K Mark Breached Amid Escalating Middle East Conflict
description: Investors are showing a preference for assets like gold and oil in this risk-off market environment as geopolitical tensions take new highs amid the Israel-Palestine standoff. Despite the selling pressure, Bitcoin continues to attract institutional investments receiving backing from billionaire Paul Tudor Jones.
